attributes.action: sponsor legislation requiring a person holding a red flag to walk afore every motor vehicle moving on the public highway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year, around 3500 deaths occur on our road network. Each one is unnecessary and a tragedy. To significantly improve road safety, and reduce deaths and injuries, a safety-person holding a red flag should walk in front of every moving vehicle to warn other road users (including pedestrians) and make the environment safer for all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
